casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. BLACK
v.
HARSHA. 2018-0241 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 25, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

Miscellaneous case. On respondents' motions to dismiss. Motions granted. Cause dismissed.
